stories.title: The Story of Your Mom
stories.text: This is the story of your mom. Your mom is many things to many people. To some she is a <noun>, because she never fails to <verb>, when it really matters. Many would describe your mom as <adjective>. Perhaps it's because she once held a <object> in her <singular body part> for <number> <unit of time plural>. Others have noted that your mom has never said a negative word about anyone (except for the time that she described your father's <plural body parts> as <adjective> and <adjective>). At the end of the day, after all she's accomplished in this world, your mom still manages to stay <adjective> no matter what happens. To some she is a hero, but she would be the first to say that, just like you and me, she puts her <article of clothing plural> on, one <singular body part> at a time.
